data.text:
I donâ€™t recommend this hotel! It was the most terrible hotel. Out of 5 stars, Iâ€™ll give 2 stars with a stretch. Maybe it was good 40 years ago. Itâ€™s so old and dirty that you want to use the antibacterial wipes all the time. The choice of food is poor, often undercooked or overcooked that it is impossible to chew and dry. They often give yesterday's food.After dinner you won't find food at the hotel. 
Of the 4 pools, only 2 were working and they were dirty. One pool is under repair, the sound of a saw from the morning until the evening - the hotel does not report this so as not to lose money. Someone shi..... in heated pool and I didnâ€™t see any special cleaning done in it  The workers at the pool which is closer to the sea are very aggressive and not friendly. The show in the evenings is bad. The snorkeling pier is rusty and not well maintained.
data.title: Old and dirty hotel

data.text:
Just returned from an amazing week in Egypt in Sharm Elsheikh at this hotel
I couldn't fault the room very spacious and it was cleaned every day as house keeping were really professional 
Gardens and grass are very beautiful 
All the staff were really polite and helpful the hotel directly has it's own beach that has coral and reef 
But the most important thing is food and it was good also animation team are very active and professional 
I will back again after university
data.title: From Warsaw with love

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Farg M,
Thank you very much for taking the time to share your wonderful feedback following your most recent experience at Sharm Grand Plaza Resort. Iâ€™m delighted we had the opportunity to welcome you and that you had such an exceptional time. It makes us so happy to hear that your experience was 5-stars as our staff takes a lot of pride in the service we provide on a daily basis. It was our immense pleasure to host you and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future. Thank you again!

Sincerely,
Hotel Management Team
owner_response.author: SGP FOM

data.text:
my very first time to visit sharm was amazing . all credit goes to the staff who were very welcoming ,very kind and helpful . and the spectacular view of the hotel view
also the restaurant has a big variety of food and great combination of deserts 
I was playing very volleyball every day and glad that they had fixed the area by adding some sand cause the people there are really professional at volleyball
the location is very good outside public transport and 2 minutes away shops also Airport is just 10 minutes
again big thanks to the animation team who were talking to me and didn't make me feel alone in this vacation thanks
data.title: Best vacation ever

data.text:
The staff at sharm grand plaza are very friendly and helpful especially the animation team,Morgan is the best one 
Also people at reception are fast and always answer you when you call them
Chefs also are nice and smile to you at the restaurant i have to say also shrimp and mushroom soup are the best ðŸ˜‚
Wifi is working every where , jacozy is warm and relaxing also good sea water and golden view in 6:00 water becomes crystal 
I was here with my friend for 1 week but i think we may come again in june at the season
data.title: Good friends and staff

data.text:
This hotel sets on the shores of the Red sea also the beach is sandy and long for about 500 meters opposite Tiran island 
The rooms have free wifi and smart screens, safes, comfortable sofas and beds and coffee machines
It has heated swimming pool and a small one also for kids 
Food is good and every day there are a different varity of food best day is the sea food day and the italian food
There is also a great gym and spa 
But what make the atmosphere is the animation team and there lovely staff especially the tall boy
data.title: Good service and golden view
